title: Home Page Sections Rendering and Responsiveness
description: Verify all 13 sections on the Home Page render correctly and responsively on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with expected animations and fully operational CTAs.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home Page on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes.

Confirm that all 13 sections (Hero, Search, Why Co-Housing, Featured Properties, AI Committee, How It Works, Services, Testimonials, Blog Insights, CTAs, By The Numbers, Success Stories) are present and visible.
Verify animations (Framer Motion) trigger correctly and smoothly during scrolling and page load.
Interact with each CTA button/link; verify proper navigation or function triggers.
Check layout and text remain readable and UI components do not overlap or break across device sizes.

title: Property Search and Filtering Functionality
description: Verify property search returns correct listings filtered by location, price, type, BHK, and status, with proper pagination and sorting.

steps.description: Navigate to the Property Listings page.
Apply a filter for location (e.g., city), price range, property type, BHK count, and status.
Verify returned property listings match all selected filter criteria.
Test sorting options by price ascending/descending and newest listings.
Confirm listings sort correctly according to the selected option.
Paginate through the listings and verify consistent page size and no duplicates.
Ensure performance criteria for API response time (<500ms p95) are met under filtering and pagination.

title: Property Details View and Enquiry Form
description: Validate detailed property pages display all information correctly including images, specs, amenities, developer info, investment metrics, and functional enquiry form.

steps.description: Select a property from the listings and navigate to its detail page.
Verify all images load and carousel functionality works.
Confirm display of property specifications, amenities, developer information, and investment-related metrics.
Fill out the enquiry form with valid data and submit.
Ensure form validation works (required fields, correct formats).
Confirm successful submission triggers acknowledgement message and inquiry is stored/logged.

title: User Authentication Flows: Registration, Login, Password Reset
description: Verify email and phone (OTP) registration, login, and password reset flows operate securely and properly manage user sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Register using a valid email with password.
Confirm registration success and redirection to dashboard or appropriate landing.
Logout and attempt login with correct email and password.
Verify login success and user session is maintained.
Test login failure with incorrect credentials.
Check error message is shown and access denied.
Initiate password reset via registered email and complete the flow.
Verify password reset email receipt, link functionality, and ability to set a new password.
Test phone OTP login flow with valid phone number and OTP input.
Confirm OTP validation and successful login.

title: AI Investment Committee Output and Access Control
description: Verify the 6 AI agents produce accurate and actionable analyses aligned with input data and respect subscription tier access restrictions.

steps.description: Login as a subscriber with Tier 1 access and request AI committee analysis for a given property.
Confirm all 6 AI agent outputs (Market Pulse, Deal Underwriter, Developer Verifier, Legal Compliance, Exit Optimizer, Synthesizer) are returned with relevant data and suggestions.
Login as a free user and attempt to access AI investment committee.
Verify limited or no access per subscription rules with appropriate messaging.
Submit varied input data scenarios (edge cases like incomplete property data) to AI agents.
Check for graceful error handling and meaningful feedback.

title: Subscription System: Payment and Access Rights Update
description: Test the subscription plans purchasing process through Razorpay integration and verify update of user access rights and limits accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription plans page within user dashboard.
Select each subscription tier and attempt purchase using Razorpay sandbox/test payment gateway.
Validate payment process completes successfully without errors.
Confirm user subscription status updates correctly post-payment.
Verify subscription benefits such as AI access tiers, property save limits, and export permissions reflect the current plan.
Test cancellation and upgrade flows, ensuring correct prorated billing or access changes.

title: User Profile Dashboard: Saved Properties and Notifications
description: Verify user dashboard displays accurate saved properties, investment history, and notifications including real-time alert reception and read/unread status toggling.

steps.description: Login as a registered user with saved properties and notifications.
Confirm all saved properties appear correctly with up-to-date data.
Trigger real-time notification by generating an event (e.g., new property listed or subscription update).
Check notification center updates immediately.
Mark notifications as read and unread.
Verify the visual status changes appropriately and persists across sessions.

title: Admin Dashboard: Property Management CRUD Operations
description: Ensure admin user can perform create, read, update, and delete operations on property records, including media uploads and developer information management with role-based access restrictions.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the Admin Property Management section.
Create a new property entry with valid data and upload media files.
Verify the property is listed with correct details and media.
Update an existing propertyâ€™s specifications and developer info.
Ensure the updates display correctly on front end and backend.
Delete a property and confirm it is removed from listings and database.
Validate role-based access: non-admin roles cannot access property management.

title: Admin User Management and Subscription Tracking
description: Verify admin can list users, manage their roles, and track subscription statuses with correct data representation and access restrictions.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Access the Admin User Management section.
Check users are listed with accurate profile and subscription information.
Update user roles (e.g., upgrade to admin, downgrade to standard user).
Verify role changes persist and access changes accordingly.
View subscription statuses and validate correct linkage to user accounts.

title: Admin AI Configuration Management
description: Verify access to AI agent configuration panel, ability to update AI prompts and settings, and ensure changes reflect correctly in AI assistant behavior.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to AI Configuration page.
Modify AI agent prompts and configuration parameters.
Ensure input validation and save operations work without errors.
Use AI assistant features as a subscriber after configuration change.
Validate AI responses reflect updated configurations.

title: Content Management System for Blog and Testimonials
description: Ensure admins can create, edit, and delete blog posts and testimonials with accurate rendering on public pages and proper role-based access controls.

steps.description: Login as admin and access the Blog and Testimonials management panels.
Create a new blog post with title, content, categories, and images.
Verify the blog post is listed in admin panel and appears correctly on public blog pages.
Edit an existing testimonial and save changes.
Check updated testimonial displays correctly on home and testimonial sections.
Delete a blog post and confirm removal from both admin and public views.

title: Contact and Enquiry Forms Validation and Submission
description: Verify all contact and property enquiry forms validate inputs, submit correctly, and store leads with acknowledgment to the user.

steps.description: Navigate to contact page and fill out inquiry form with valid data.
Confirm form validation triggers on invalid or missing required fields.
Submit the form and verify success acknowledgement.
Validate lead is recorded in back-end database or lead management system.
Repeat for property enquiry forms on property detail pages.

title: Static Pages Content and Accessibility Verification
description: Verify all static pages (About, Services, How It Works, FAQs, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions) display correct content, are responsive, and meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

steps.description: Navigate to each static page.
Check presence of all key content sections and correct formatting.
Test keyboard navigation across content and verify screen reader compatibility.
Confirm color contrast and font sizes meet accessibility guidelines.

title: Performance and Uptime Under Load
description: Validate platform meets performance targets: First Contentful Paint (FCP) under 1.5 seconds, API p95 latency under 500ms, and uptime above 99.9% under load testing scenarios.

steps.description: Use performance testing tools to measure FCP on Home Page and Property Listings under normal and peak loads.
Verify FCP remains below 1.5 seconds across supported devices.
Conduct API load testing for key endpoints (property search, AI assistant, subscription management).
Ensure 95th percentile API response times stay under 500ms.
Simulate prolonged load and monitor uptime.
Confirm uptime meets or exceeds 99.9% during test period.

title: Security Testing: HTTPS Enforcement, Data Encryption, and Rate Limiting
description: Verify end-to-end security features including HTTPS enforcement for all endpoints, encryption of sensitive data at rest and in transit, and rate limiting to prevent abuse.

steps.description: Attempt to access platform endpoints via HTTP and verify automatic redirection to HTTPS.
Confirm that no unsecured HTTP endpoints exist.
Inspect data encryption mechanisms on sensitive data, verifying encryption at REST (database) and in transit (TLS).
Ensure encryption keys and certificates are valid and securely managed.
Test API rate limiting by sending excessive requests and monitor platform response.
Confirm rate limiting triggers appropriate error responses and mitigates abuse.
